page.syntax: Record_List as C = random_record_list(N count [,C filter])

argument.name: Record_List
argument.description: A space delimited list of random record numbers. Numeric

argument.name: count
argument.description: The number of record numbers to return. Numeric

argument.name: filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = ".T." (all records). A character filter expression that limits the number of records to select from.

page.discussion: The RANDOM_RECORD_LIST() function returns a list of random record numbers from the current table.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script, placed under a button on a form, displays three random record numbers from the current table.
